item.description:
Sundered Skies is a campaign setting for the Savage Worlds system, one where islands float in a vast void. It combines many of the trappings of a traditional fantasy setting with piracy and horror. You can learn more about the setting here.

Savage Worlds is a rules-light alternative to D&D, emphasizing pulp action and drama. You can learn more about Savage Worlds here and here. Savage Worlds allows for high degree of character customization, but the mechanics focus on character capabilities, not personality: think Indiana Jones, not Bram Stoker's Dracula.

I plan to run the campaign with a group of 6-8 players, probably on alternating Saturdays, though our first meeting will be on a Sunday, June 28. I'm looking for players who enjoy deep engagement with an action-centered game, but not necessarily battle-mat centered action.

If you're interested, please check out the campaign website and if you find yourself inspired you should be able to get started on a character â€” I've provided pretty much all the information you need.

You can also drop me an email with questions and, though I may not be able to get right back to you, you should get a response within a few days.
item.name: Sundered Skies over Boston (Savage Worlds system)
